select from yishengxinxi where 1=1
and yishenggonghao =#{yishenggonghao}

select from yishengxinxi where 1=1 and yishenggonghao like concat('%',#{yishenggonghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and yishengxingming like concat('%',#{yishengxingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingbie like concat('%',#{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and zhicheng like concat('%',#{zhicheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and suozaikeshi like concat('%',#{suozaikeshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and zhuzhizhengzhuang like concat('%',#{zhuzhizhengzhuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and lianxidianhua like concat('%',#{lianxidianhua,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenfenzheng like concat('%',#{shenfenzheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and beizhu like concat('%',#{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

insert into yishengxinxi
id,
yishenggonghao, yishengxingming, mima, xingbie, zhicheng, suozaikeshi, zhuzhizhengzhuang, lianxidianhua, shenfenzheng, beizhu,
addtime,

update yishengxinxi
yishenggonghao = #{yishenggonghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yishengxingming = #{yishengxingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mima = #{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingbie = #{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhicheng = #{zhicheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suozaikeshi = #{suozaikeshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhuzhizhengzhuang = #{zhuzhizhengzhuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lianxidianhua = #{lianxidianhua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenfenzheng = #{shenfenzheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beizhu = #{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
